name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thedice, ezcmac, Howard, SenseiHollywood, unsentletter)

name: arcibi
text: He'll smite you where it counts

name: unsentletter
text:
" he shall... he'll...
he'll smite you...

where it counts "


Holy crap, I love this comic so much... with Phillipe's dancing, the diabeetus mention, Beef gettin' down with K.Burns, and Ray's slow cardio descent to the floor... just so much to love. Thank you Onstad.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Philippe dances like a little 19th century cabin boy.


Which is what he is, I suppose.

name: boyd
text: for those who care to inquire, where it counts is the sack.

name: tripleg
text: it really is the worst place to be smote

name: greenkoolayd
text: indeed.  thats where i keep all my feelings.

name: saint
text: who the hell did I hit?

name: nigelchaos
text: Every time I see that.. I imagine Wilford Brimley has his own circle of Hell that's filled with all sorts of candy-sugary-sweet goodness.. and then I can't sleep.

name: zig-zaglada
text: That is definitely my kind of Hell.

name: invidious
text:
This picture isn't much of a leap once you've seen him go nuts with an ax in "The Thing."

(That was a bad-ass scene, btw, all goin' crazy with a fire ax and then getting beat-down by Kurt Russell and Keith David.)

text:

text: god that thing rules.

name: direhaggis
text: Ray needs to work out more. Being possessed is like high-impact cardio.

name: tellumo
text: Beef is not yet a good enough banjo player to fully exploit its potential for evil. He got no chops on that device.

name: chaesar
text: Again with the diabetes.

name: andrew_
text: Philippe's happy little jig is making me forget all of my troubles.

name: pogo
text: Cutest little dance of joy ever.

name: tombsgrave
text: Right in Hit Location 10 he'll smite you.

name: junko
text: I think this is actually the first in-strip mention of Diabetes. Correct me if I'm wrong.

name: julia
text: Beef mentioned it previously as one of his neuroses.

name: cdl146
text: Diabetes has been a running gag through the whole strip. Take a trip through the archives, its everywhere.

name: zem
text: just like in real life

name: teira
text: again with the chicken!

name: sigmaris
text: Do all of Ray's musical instruments come directly from Satan?

name: crinklebat
text: Yeah, pretty much.

name: tekende
text: Presumably not his childhood drum.

name: invidious
text: No, all BANJOS come from Satan.

name: laudabilis
text: I imagine that rolling in tubs of lice would be hella unpleasant. And I wonder who Ray is talking to in his Satan-sent ranting.

name: phthoggos
text: 5'd for Philippe

name: i_love_kate
text: Ray correctly surmises that not being him is quite enough qualification to be considered "unlucky".

name: nonanon
text:
Is it wrong that I kind of wish this is what diabetes was actually like?

really though i kind of think people would prefer it

name: tekende
text: So it'd be like Satanic tourette's?

name: atticusonline
text: Now I'll do a little dance

name: carlyle
text: It's the five face! Even the movement lines!

name: zem
text:
ray seems to be affected by the evil banjo almost exactly like he's vomiting uncontrollably
